page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: {CAR OWNERSHIP SURVEY. 91% OF THE HOMES OWNED ONE OR MORE CARS. 74% OF THE CARS WERE MORE THAN FOUR YEARS OLD .70% OF THE CARS WERE MADE IN BRITAIN. {TRAFFIC COUNT_MARAZION BYPASS } A TRAFFIC COUNT ON THE NEW MARAZION BYPASS WAS MADE AT A QUIET TIME BETWEEN PEAK PERIODS. IT SHOWED THAT 464 VEHICLES PER HR WERE USING THE ROAD. BEFORE THE BYPASS WAS BUILT MARAZION WAS BADLY CONGESTED WITH TRAFFIC. {BUS SERVICES} SERVICE IS PROVIDED BY TWO COMPANIES, THE{WESTERN NATIONAL}AND THE{GRENVILLE {BUS COMPANY}- THR LATTER BEING A PRIVATE CONCERN. EACH COMPANY RUNS ONE SERVICE ROUTE CONNECTING GOLDSITHNEY AND MARAZION WITH FALMOUTH AND PENZANCE.
